SEARCH
Module AM08
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class View

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.View
Direct Known Subclasses:
CLI, GUIView
public abstract class View extends Object
This abstract class is used to represent the view of the game; it will be extended in class Cli and Gui, the real view of the game

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(State newState, GameInfo newGameInfo)
      This method is called by the server to update the view
      Parameters:
      newState - the new state of the game, it will be used to update the view
      newGameInfo - the new gameInfo, it will be used to update the view

    • display

      protected abstract void display()
      This method is called by update to display the game

    • getUserInput

      public void getUserInput()
      This method is called by the client main to start the view; at the beginning it will be asked the nickName the player wants, then if he wants to create a new game or join an existing one; then the player wait for another players

    • welcome

      protected abstract void welcome()
      This method is called by getUserInput to welcome the player

    • waitForGameStart

      protected abstract void waitForGameStart()
      This method is called by getUserInput to wait for other players to join the game

    • checkForShutdown

      public void checkForShutdown()
      This method is launched in a new thread to check if the client has crashed

    • waitCommand

      protected abstract String waitCommand()
      This method is called by start to wait for a command from the player
      Returns:
      the command represented as a string

    • parseCommand

      protected abstract void parseCommand(String command)
      This method is called by waitCommand to parse the command and call the right method
      Parameters:
      command - the command to parse

    • chooseConnectionType

      protected abstract void chooseConnectionType()
      This method is called by start to ask the player if he wants to connect via rmi or socket

    • askNickname

      protected abstract void askNickname()
      This method is called by start to ask the player his nickname and send it to the server

    • createOrJoinGame

      protected abstract void createOrJoinGame()
      This method is called by start to ask the player if he wants to create a new game or join an existing one

    • isMyTurn

      protected boolean isMyTurn()
      This method is called by parseCommand to check if it's the player's turn, if not it will not send the command to the server; to check this, we compare the nickname with the currentPlayer nickname in the gameInfo received in the last update
      Returns:
      true if it's the player's turn, false otherwise

    • checkValidPosition

      protected boolean checkValidPosition(List<Position> positions, Position pos)
      this method is used to check if the position is valid : it calls method checkSinglePosition and getAdj on list positions : if checkSinglePosition returns true and getAdj(positions) contains pos, return true
      Parameters:
      positions - list of positions already chosen by the player
      pos - new position chosen by the player
      Returns:
      true if checkSinglePosition returns true and getAdj called on list positions contains pos

    • getAdj

      protected List<Position> getAdj(List<Position> pos)
      this method return the list of the Position the player can choose after the previous moves
      Parameters:
      pos - list of positions already chosen by the player
      Returns:
      the list of the Position the player can choose after the previous moves

    • checkColumn

      protected boolean checkColumn(int col, int numTiles)
      this method check if the column chosen by the player is valid
      Parameters:
      col - the column selected by the player
      numTiles - the number of tiles taken by the player
      Returns:
      true if the column is valid, false if is not valid

    • askIfWantToPlayAgain

      protected abstract boolean askIfWantToPlayAgain()
      This method is called by start to ask the player if he wants to play again
      Returns:
      true if the player wants to play again, false otherwise

    • close

      protected void close(String message)
      This method tell the user that the client is shutting down
      Parameters:
      message - the message to display

    • notifyClose

      protected abstract void notifyClose(String message)
      This method is called by close to notify the player that the client is shutting down
      Parameters:
      message - the message to display

    • displayChatMessage

      public abstract void displayChatMessage(String message)
      This method is called to print a message in the chat on the screen
      Parameters:
      message - the message to display

    • getLeaderBoardAsText

      protected String getLeaderBoardAsText()
      this method is used to parse the final leaderboard of the game as a string
      Returns:
      a string containing the final leaderboard (player, finalPoints of the player)
